Articles.Content:
Hello

I have a question.

Is there a way for me to use only the textures of this mod for the orion capsule from bobcats american pack?

Or just to get the Orion pod from this mod?

I know this pack is designed to be used as a whole but I'm already pushing ksp to the RAM limit and spent alot of time making sure all the mods and all the parts are necessary.

Anyway thanks in advance for any kind of help.

P.s.:The Dropbox links on page 11 don't work atleast for me.

Hello

I have a question.

Is there a way for me to use only the textures of this mod for the orion capsule from bobcats american pack?

Or just to get the Orion pod from this mod?

I know this pack is designed to be used as a whole but I'm already pushing ksp to the RAM limit and spent alot of time making sure all the mods and all the parts are necessary.

Anyway thanks in advance for any kind of help.

P.s.:The Dropbox links on page 11 don't work atleast for me.

You could it would take just alittle rewrite of the Part cfg but one could do it and what INTERNAL did you want to use and size ? And if YANFRET don't mind, I rewrite the part file to work but it will be later today got something to do.

That would be extremely nice of you and I don't mind waiting.

Regarding the internals: I use Raster Prop monitor and I'm fairly happy with the internals of the default Orion Capsule. It's more about the outside textures.

Anyway if you could do that that would be awesome.

It's ironic that our two MBM test case textures are causing you an issue. They are part of our experiment to get away from TGA and PNG. As for the file size, MBM might be huge on the disk but actually uses the least memory in game and has the fastest load time. That plus the squad caused TGA loading bug is why we are experimenting with MBM conversion in the first place. I wonder if a special settings config for ATM is the answer.

Re Atlas V: No. However with KW rocketry and a few lionhead aerospace products, you can Lego your way to a convincing and high quality MSL mission.

If I were going to add antother launch system to Chaka, it would be the Jaxa H-IIB

It would be sweet if some one would do the Osimov and Kepler MLVs for the Constelation mission also, but I know what kind of project that would be so it looks like I'm going to have to be creative for now.

Well one thing at a time

Tantares is a very impressive pack and Beale's products are consistently of the highest quality
sorry but I'm lazy , what other launcher are you going to add?

sorry but I'm lazy , what other launcher are you going to add?

I didn't know I was adding any until you guys told me so! haha well I'm not sure but you'll know it when we do
Did anybody ever make a HotRockets config for the engines?

Did anybody ever make a HotRockets config for the engines?

Pretty sure no haven't seen anyone post 1.

Darn, looks like I know what I'll be doing with the next few days of my life. Those things take forever.
Are there any mods that would allow mechjeb's dV readout to see the monopropellent engines?

Are there any mods that would allow mechjeb's dV readout to see the monopropellent engines?

I don't know but it would be really sweet if it happened without needing another mod.

Is there any chance of us getting an asteroid retrieval mission in Chaka style? I'm wanting to use your mod to recreate some of NASAs to-do list, and since you're matching some of their mission profiles, I was wondering if that's on your list as well.
Have these parts been rebalanced to in-game specifications? These are seriously the best mod parts in the game, but they lack balance outside of the Chaka Monkey ecosystem.

Is there any chance of us getting an asteroid retrieval mission in Chaka style? I'm wanting to use your mod to recreate some of NASAs to-do list, and since you're matching some of their mission profiles, I was wondering if that's on your list as well.

Yes. Working on something super for asteroid / Minmus exploration presently. Got a few fundamental questions to resolve before we show it.

In fact the recently added "exploration habitat" program is a step in that direction

Have these parts been rebalanced to in-game specifications? These are seriously the best mod parts in the game, but they lack balance outside of the Chaka Monkey ecosystem.

Hey thanks! If you start with the highest quality ingredients...

No / true. It is bespoke and not "exobalanced".

PS: I really like the phrase "Chaka monkey ecosystem"

Edited December 12, 2014 by YANFRET

I'm seeing some odd lighting issues with the parts and Orion capsule can bring my framerate to a crawl. Anyone else seeing that? Anything I can do about it?

I'm really loving this mod, btw, about to land my first crew on Duna because of this.

I'm really loving this mod, btw, about to land my first crew on Duna because of this.

Check the error log and see if there are any errors during the time of frame rate drop.

I'm seeing some odd lighting issues with the parts and Orion capsule can bring my framerate to a crawl. Anyone else seeing that? Anything I can do about it?

I'm really loving this mod, btw, about to land my first crew on Duna because of this.

Also please review what other mod products are installed.

i test flew the EMLV III-Orion (EFT-1 replica). axes in vab were flipped, had to use w instead of d to go east. rocket wobbled around and i eventually ended the flight because of wobble. standard launch profile (45 degrees at 10 km).

By the way, after conducting a detailed investigation we did find a vibration issue with the EMLV III vehicle. The node size of the engine mount part at the bottom of each CBC was not set correctly. Increasing this node to 3 top and bottom totally removed the vibration. This may give you additional flexibility when experimenting with unusual flight paths and manual control.

The next update will include the fix however for now you can download the fixed part here, no changes to craft files needed.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/rv29or8belua1e6/MERGE%20WITH%20CMES.zip?dl=0

Edited December 13, 2014 by YANFRET

Coming soon...

Very cool! Loving the habitat a lot, I always thought Orion needed a toilet and some more space for monkey-bars

I modified the Orion MPCV to work in RO, and flight tested it. Checks out (mostly - some small tweaks and it's good).

Also, Altair lander is reporting good thrust and Delta-vee's, and full masses are all accurate to the kg.

So if Chaka's okay with it I might could make this available so RO players can access this, soon.
